Sioux_Falls.Sioux City North High School:
North High School (commonly North, North High, or NHS) is a public secondary school located in Sioux City, Iowa with an enrollment of approximately 1,500 students. The school is a part of the Sioux City School District and is one of three public high schools in Sioux City.


== Bus service ==
The school is serviced by Sioux City Transit, which is open to all fare-paying passengers Monday to Friday during the school year.
